name: L Sproat
text: Great dinner with my family and boyfriend.  Service was wonderful and the food was very good as always.  Just make sure you have an OCR reader to download menu

name: Belou P
text: A little dark due to nighttime. Nothing burnt. ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS! Gluten free veggie pizza. Thank you so much!

name: Kirsten Cansler
text: Friendliest group of people in town! I adored this place and the food is amazing!! Will visit again!

name: Rhond Gribensk
text: The food is excellent. The staff is great also. Very helpful.

name: Alyssa Tillett
text: Went here with family who was visiting from out of town. We ordered 2 pizzas, one of them being the mushroom one. We were very disappointed when the pizza had around 2 mushrooms per slice! Hardly any cheese either. We were very ‚Ä¶More

name: James Garner
text: Great friendly service. Clean environment and over all amazing food 10/10

name: Johnny Monroe
text: Pizza was warm not hot was cold before I got it all eat

name: Jen Harris
text: Very clean. They were following social distancing protocols and every employee was wearing a face mask. Service was nice and fast. They also now have touch-less digital menus that you can look at on your phone.

name: Carolyn Rebeck
text: The young man who answered the phone hung up on us!  I called at 9pm to place an order was informed they had just closed. I politely informed him that online it says they close at 10 pm. He immediately stated, very rudely, that it does say ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith Jones
text: My girlfriend, her kids, and I popped in after visiting Greenback Castle in Maryville. The service and pies were excellent. We got carryout boxes for what we couldn't finish, but I totally spaced out and left them at our table. Before I ‚Ä¶More

name: stacey ferguson
text: Only 1 star because 0 isnt an option! Bad move mellow! I have a medical condition preventing me from wearing a mask. It was illegal for your employees to ask me about. More than 2 employees asked. The third one informed me I must leave ‚Ä¶More

name: Joy Stilwell
text: The food was delicious and our server did a good job.  Social distancing was used in seating and staff wore masks.

name: Chris Heffernan
text: As always, it is my favorite go to for pizza and pretzels.  Absolutely delicious.  Abbey was remarkable in her server duties while attending to others as well. Excellent job everyone. üëçüëçüëç

name: Christopher Parsons
text: Great pizza and atmosphere will go back

name: Samantha York
text: We love Mellow! Grabbed some salads and a pizza on our way out of town. Safe and delicious!

name: Robert Kent
text:
Great cheesy bread and meat pizza.

The staff was great and friendly.

name: David Presley
text: We had great food. I'm eating plant based and they have some good tasting vegan options. The service was a little off even though there were not many customers. The prince was pretty high for me. I will give the mellow mushroom my business again. I just hope next time the prices drop and the service improves.

name: shopJerry Kiser
text: Always very good house special is best mmmmm

name: Jesse Mercer
text:
First time eating at mellow mushroom
great food and service

name: Max Rigsby
text: Good vibes, great location in Farragut... less than half a mile from the interstate. ‚Ä¶More

name: Debra Ann Weiss
text: Yummy creamy fresh mushroom soup,  good bruschetta, wonderful veggie pizza too! *****

name: Corey Moore
text: Corey was a great server. Food was good. Over priced!

name: Mr B
text: Great service, consistent food quality and vegan friendly. Outdoor patio is nice.

name: Zedorck
text: Lots of options and gluten free options as well.

name: Jenny Thompson
text: They have one of my favorite vegan pizzas. There are so many topping options. The only bad thing is that they have really slow service. It takes a while for them to cook pizzas, and it is pretty consistently slow. But it is good-tasting food!

name: Cathy Wilcox-Crovatt
text: Consistently excellent pizza and pretzel appetizer.

name: Tyler Eaves
text: Good food refreshing beer great service You won't  Be disappoint.

name: Elizabeth Price
text: The atmosphere was great, and don't get me started on the service (it was amazing). I really appreciated the importance of natural resources. Even the straws were eco-friendly. It was a very pleasant experience!! The food was awesome, especially the appetizers. Would recommend!!

name: Liliana Martinez
text: I arrived at MM because my team was celebrating so we got seated right away then we waited for a good amount of time for our food it was super good but then when we left and arrived at our hotel my brother had vomited so I thought he was ‚Ä¶More

name: April Collins
text: OMG. The gluten free pizza was amazing!!!! I wish there was one northwest of Philadelphia.

name: Andrew Proffitt
text: Really good pizza defenty check it out

name: Carl Kahle
text: The pizza was outstanding and they offer safe options for people with peanut allergies.  Great service accompanies the great food!

name: Dillon Fiest
text: Always my #1 for pizza/calzones been to locations from Tennessee all the way to Florida. Mellow Mushroom is always spot on with service and quality.

name: Lesha Clark
text: Never had eaten at one let alone hear of this restaurant before that day. Very pleasantly surprised to find facility was clean. Staff was very expedient and helpful. Portions were better than I expected. Food was very tasty.

name: edward haller
text: Wow! We love this place. Although they're famous for their pizzas, we got a Greek salad and their outrageous mushroom soup. The salad was big enough that I got lunch and dinner from it. Their house dressing for this salad was outstanding, ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrea Breeding
text: Airy,casual restaurant that specializes in pizza but also has salads and sandwiches. A little glitch when I got there. Someone forgot I was there. As soon as they realized it they were apologetic and everything went well from then on. ‚Ä¶More

name: Garrett Granroth
text: Good pizza with high quality toppings.

name: Aaron James
text: Good food, good service, sitting outside means smelling the dumpster.

name: Karen Thompson
text: I love Mellow Mushroom, or I did. It's a little pricey, they reduced amount of ingredients, and they didn't mention a $2.50 charge for including jalapenos on pizza. I wouldn't have added them, had I known about extra charge. Pizza tasted great. Service fair to good.

name: Missy Hinds
text: Wonderful food and Lacey was fantastic!

name: Dawn McFarland
text: By far the best pizza around. Very consistent in quality- not like other places where it's always one thing or another that is wrong.

name: Gary Kleisley
text: Great pizza and the server was friendly and kept the drinks flowing like a river.

name: Charles Seidel
text: Pizza was good. Staff is nice...

name: Riley Farraher
text: Great pizzas and all the workers are very nice and welcoming üëç

name: Janet Brichetto
text: Always love this place.

name: Cory
text: The pizza here is always outstanding, definitely one of my favorites.

name: Justin Wiseman
text: Food and service was great!

name: Billy Pilkey
text: The pizza is always incredible!!

name: Heidi Montero
text: So we are on the road ordered a vegan pie and turned out to be reg cheese. Well we called innthey not only had the pozza ready fornus but reembursed us in full!!! Thats amazing. It was an honest mistake and they reembursed us in full. The staff was so nice to us 5 stars for to mellow mushroom from us

name: Tandy Julian
text: Seemed to be short staffed. Bartender was working tables when i got there. Initially slow service but as it cleared out noticed others coming in got very quick service. Took a long time for pizza to get to me, as a result not very hot and definitely not as tasty as i remember it used to be.

name: Patrick Miller
text: Awesome pizza served by awesome people

name: Lydia Williams
text: Oh my gosh. Two words: Holy Shitake. Yep, that is the best pizza I've ever had. If you like garlic, you will love it. Started off with the spinach salad, which was so good with dried cherries and candied pecans. Yum. Will be back. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Moore
text: Food was good but a lil pricey

name: Martha bellman
text: Food was very good, but kitchen was extremely slow. It took over an hour to get our hoagie sandwich. Not great when you are traveling. Experience was made worse by the fact that table behind us ordered after us, got the same sandwich as us, ‚Ä¶More

name: Liz Looney
text: The service was excellent, Corey I believe. Attentive w/o overbearing.  First rate. The food: Meatball app was room temperature,  as were pizzas. Wth? No regard for temperature with food or beverage.  Had to get a cold glass for my beer. Pizza was great, just needed to be cooked more. Flavors were great.

name: Nicole Kross
text: Friendly staff, nice atmosphere. Don't expect a quality drink. Unless you dislike alcohol, then you're good to go. Also, the burger sounds better than it tastes. Steamed, bland meat. Tasted like high school all over again.

name: John Kerni
text: Great.  Pizza dough has changed over last month making it even better.  Great service beer and food

name: Rachel Shults
text: Mellow is usually my favorite pizza place. This location was...meh. It is basically a sports bar, not quite the "mellow mushroomy" atmosphere I've seen at other ones. The service was very slow as well. My pizza was pretty good, but just not quite what it usually is. My husband was ecstatic over his loaded potato pizza, however.

name: Adolfo Eguiluz
text: Very enjoyable, and I like the Philly cheese steak! But all their pizza and other food is also good!

name: brown smith
text: Went on Trivia night. Kinda busy but super fun. Really enjoyed our time there and the atmosphere was awesome. Food was spectacular I never thought I would like a pizza without meat. I like the Holy Shitake so much its my new favorite!

name: Eric Ostrander
text: Not your normal Mellow Mushroom. Service was good and the food was ok. Not sure if menu is location specific but first time at a MM where typical order was different than any other MM we have been in. Food was good just different. Restrooms were clean and store was clean just a little dry for a MM.

name: Ryan Champy
text: Great pizza place, as is all Mellow Mushroom locations I have frequented.  I've been to a dozen plus locations and all are consistently good quality and service, great beer selection and food, side salads are amazing especially considering ‚Ä¶More

name: cara divelbiss
text: We love Mello Mushroom especially my Grandson

name: Paula Mills
text: Great tasting pizzas!

name: Laurie Ann
text: Great food but restaurant was very untidy

name: Joshua Altier
text: Come on. If you're ready these reviews you don't know what you're missing...

name: hope till
text: Love their salad and pizza.

name: Patrick Seward Jr
text: Friendly staff and amazing food. 4th location Ive been to and there product consistancy is AWESOME!

name: Samuel Parkman
text:
Our family visited here for my nephew's 9th birthday, a party of 10.

We were seated together with sufficient table room. Pizzas were delivered to our ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Unlisted
text:
Our family visited here my nephew's 9th birthday, a party if 10.

We were seated together with sufficient table room. Pizzas were delivered to our ‚Ä¶More

name: David Nichols
text: Really great pizza.

name: Quentin McHugh
text: Always have an enjoyable experience at this establishment, specifically that one manager, I think his name is like Cullen? or something? great guy

name: Hannah Ramsey
text: I had Brittany as a server. Seriously the sweetest girl ever. She was on top of it and made sure we had our drinks filled up at all times. She was quick to get out pizza out! Would definitely go here again and request her.

name: Adam Ayres
text: Pizza was amazing and server was very friendly and knowledgeable about the food and beverages. Great dinning experience!!!

name: Cammy Spradling
text: Absolutely wonderful. Food was great. Service was excellent.

name: Chon Scott
text: Tasty pizza and excellent crust to boot.

name: Gina D
text: The atmosphere, food, and service is always great at this establishment. You will definitely want to go here, even if it is out of the way. They have many option besides pizza and cater to vegan and gluten free communities!

name: Emily Patton
text: The service and food was great! They have a ton options for pizza and other items as well! I. Lactose intolerant and they had vegan cheese that I was able eat without issue! Our waiter even made sure that the butter they put on our crust would be okay! It was a great experience!!

name: Kenny Ferrell
text: Mellow Mushroom had gluten free pizzas and they are the same price as a regular pizza.  They have pizza that is shown in the menu as completely gluten free and each topping that is gluten free.  This is a must for my wife.  She ordered the gluten free house special and I ordered the regular house special and both were delicious.

name: Julie Swiney
text: Great food!  The place was slammed and service was slow.  This location is not as decorated as others we've been to...

name: Anita Henderlight
text: Unique pies available along with standard favorites. Fun, hip vibe. The mushroom soup and greek salad make for a tasty combo at lunch.

name: Ross Eison
text: Solid pizza--Mighty Meaty and Kosmic Karma--and kind and accommodating service.

name: Sierra Cardone
text: Delicious hoagies, and great vegan options.

name: Heather Tetzloff
text: One of our favorite places to eat. Try their crust in beer cheese dip. Yum!

name: Melanie S
text: Delicious food and helpful staff!! The Greek salad is amazing and the large feeds our family of 5! Best gluten free pizza, too!!

name: Joseph Campbell
text: The food is always good and you will return for more.

name: Donna Freemon
text: Love, love MM. Always have, but the reason I didn't give them a 5 is my yummy pizza with pineapple was canned pineapple! Not tasty, not fresh. I was disappointed.

name: Unique Lee
text: Ordered 2 pies - one under cooked, one overcooked and neither was hot. They were also out of several things. But, our server was nice.

name: Mae Manis
text: If you've never been to a Mellow Mushroom, you should treat yourself and go. They are always an experience. This one is no exception. Not wildest Mellow building I've been it but it's a nice one. The staff were pleasant, the food was delightful, the parking could be better. Park wherever you can and come enjoy a good pizza.

name: Eric Thompson
text: The food was very good and our waiter was personable too.  The four stars comes from the fact that the staff could not be bothered to acknowledge my wife and I when we entered the restaurant.  A group of people were engrossed in ‚Ä¶More

name: Brenda Ponsford
text: Fantastic food and friendly service.

name: Sean Hadnot
text: I had the steak n cheese calzone, very good. Service time was great.  Hot food came out hot. No complaints.  Will eat there again when in town.

name: Joey Walker
text: Excellent food and service!

name: Sherrie A
text: Great food and great service!

name: Exquirentibus Veritatem
text: It was the werk before Christmas...and though you were very busy...my first trip to mellow mushroom was exceptional!  Thank you!!

name: southern momma
text: Lexi was the bartender she did an amazing job! Highly recommend the highlamd oatmeal porter on draft and the large pizza with double sausage and double cheese on it!

name: Cameron Hege
text: Food was wrong and had to be remade, the seating area was HOT (granted it was a 90 degree day but, we brought our 10 month old and fanned him the entire time). Our waitress was great, though our table of 6 received drink refills with ZERO ‚Ä¶More

name: Tammy Smith
text: Love their Greek salad with Esperanza dressing.  Delicious! Their pizza is okay.

name: Tennessee Butterfly
text: Greek salad was amazing ! Calzones was delcious.

name: Bethany Brantley
text: I didn't catch the name of the pizza, but it had truffle oil on it & it was delicious!!

name: Jackie Fitz
text: Great pizza with some more adventurous options. Very vegetarian friendly. The kosmic karma is a standout. Restaurant also cares about the environment and does not have plastic straws!

name: Kyle Salyers
text: Great service, clean restrooms, close proximity to interstate and hotels.

name: Troy Amadeus
text: Excellent pizza and service.  Although the atmosphere was pretty bland and lackluster compared to other Mellow Mushroom locations.  But other than that it was great

name: Joe Gleason
text: Great service. Great food.

name: Nick Shipley
text: Showed up and was seated immediately! But our order was another story....... our food came after 1 hour of waiting, our appetizers came 1.5 hrs into the wait , and our friends kids didnt get there food until about 2hrs in. Last but not ‚Ä¶More

name: Aspartame Daddy
text: Super cool and down to earth people work here and the food is so delicious I'm having them cater my wedding. ‚Ä¶More

name: Prkid santiago
text: Great customer service. Highly recommend

name: Killeen Armstrong
text: Love love the food and the funky decor , never disappoints!!

name: Ashley Owens
text: The food was delicious as always. I did have a problem this visit but they corrected it immediately and were incredibly kind.

name: TEAM Spextrum
text: It seems they know pizza. We liked it.

name: Aaron Wrasman
text: Great food and great service.

name: Mike Montgomery
text: I like Mellow Mushroom. The pizza is always good. The whole time I eaten pizza there I've only gotten 1 pizza with a tragic hole and they made it right before they even brought the pizza out with the hole.

name: Nancy Sweat
text: Mellow Mushroom not only has a great selection of pizzas and calzones they have an excellent assortment of beers on tap. They even have a high gravity or two.  The atmosphere is friendly and the service is wonderful.  I've been there for lunch,  early evening,  and supper.  The service is always great.

name: Lauren Olson
text: Large booths, friendly staff, and good food!

name: Dan Pacitti
text: Went at 5:30p on a Saturday evening. Called ahead and not only reserved a table, but went ahead and ordered pizzas. Got there, got the table, and had pizza within 10 minutes. Fantastic. Great atmosphere, not too busy.

name: tony chavez
text: Food was amazing and place was clean

name: Bones Myself
text: Was our first visit. The food was amazing, and the portions more than expected for the price. Only area that could use improvement, is that it is apparent that the servers use the glasses to scoop ice and it has caused chipping and wear to them.

name: Anne Parris
text: Friendly service, big portions, tasty food. Very noisy and hard to have a conversation without shouting. Family friendly. I didn't know what to expect, but it's like a Red Robin with a hippie vibe to the decor. ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicholas Hibbard
text: Very nice place to go by self or family. The bartender was very nice, the people are good, the front door girl was charming, and the manager Stephen was so nice that he seemed like an old friend. Food is very good, üçï is always a good choice as are any of the sandwiches.

name: Edward Mcdonald
text: One of the best pizza places around Knoxville.

name: Jenn T
text: Excellent food and trivia night was awesome!

name: Drew Menzie
text: The best pizza around in my opinion!!! They are high on their prices but your getting great tasting pizza every time! All kinds of selections. They also have a bar!

name: carl mcginn
text: Quality pizza in a family friendly setting. Good beer menu as well

name: Kimberlie Parks
text: Love Mellow! It is also our kids favorite place to get pizza! Atmosphere is always amazing and service is great!

name: Curtis Gillis
text: Worst service I've ever had. Spent 1 hour to get our pizza and 1.5 hours to get the appetizers. My kids didn't get their pizza until 2 hours in and as we were leaving they messed up on our checks. WORST. SERVICE. EVER.

name: Michael England
text: The food and customer service was excellent

name: Matthew Timm
text: Great food ever time

name: Patrick Miller
text: Awesome people Awesome pizza

name: Billy Hager
text: Great food, quick and nice service! Will definitely come back

name: Dinata Misovec
text: Mellow Mushroom is the best place in the universe 4 Pizza. And this one was cooked to perfection

name: Corey Watson
text: Order the ‚ÄúPineapple Express‚Äù pizza. It‚Äôs not on the menu anymore but they will still make it.

name: Brandon Coley
text: The mushroom pizza is FANTASTIC! I ate the entire thing in one sitting because it was soooo good. Hold on... my left arm hurts...

name: Dana Zehner

name: Casey Huffaker

name: Brittany Brooks

name: Frank Alcala
text: Staff is awesome. Manager was super nice. Took a bit long to get a server at our table but they gave us comp appetizer for the "inconvenience" (it really wasn't an inconvenience). Food was pretty good!

name: Tilden Miller
text: Fantastic Pizza!

name: Austin Noland
text: Love this place!... any and every location I've ever been to

name: Stephen E
text: Very good pizza. Garlic cheese bread was a little bland. The kids enjoyed their time there.

name: Eugene Adams
text: Great pizza

name: ALLEN WINDSOR
text: Clean dining room. Responsive wait staff. Good pizza. They serve a dairy free pizza my grandson can eat. Noise level is acceptable.  Beer is cold. All good!

name: Trecia
text: I was invited to a birthday party, and had just started a new diet. Really wanted pizza, but had the most amazing salad. I'll go back for sure.

name: Shane Cross
text: Pizza and atmosphere here are really nice. Last Visit my pizza was made wrong, but they quickly noticed and put a fresh one in for me. I would recommend this place for a nice pizza!!

name: Angela Carrier
text: THE place for a great calzone!

name: Jason R
text: Traveling through on our way to Ohio, we stopped for a quick bite. Ordered a simple cheese pizza. Great value, inexpensive, and really, just simply great tasting pizza. Server was friendly and attentive, food was delivered promptly. Every ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristi Daniels
text: Last time I was here for a to go order, they dropped the pizza and had to remake it while I waited. Whatever, accidents happen. This time, they neglected to include pepperoni on my pepperoni and mushroom pizza. Solution is to grill the pepperoni and add them to the original pizza. For a $30 three topping pizza, I expect better!

name: Dewayne Claiborne
text: Very good pizza and wings! My girlfriend and I enjoyed two pizzas to ourselves, and they were much bigger than we thought. Had to take them home. Awesome atmosphere here, and a great waiter! We will definitely be making this a regular spot.

name: Camillia Spradling
text: Excellent food and service.

name: Gregory Letner
text: Gotta love this place. Lower prices a hairr....... great place for casual partying and family fun

name: Michelle Leighton
text: Just love Maui Pizzaüòãand meatballs

name: Adam McCue
text: Artisan crust, interesting combinations, great beer selection. Service last time was exceptional thanks to Jacob... Def recommend!

name: Katherine Morris
text: Excellent pizza varieties and they are delicious! Nice atmosphere and great service, too!!

name: Riley Bronaugh
text: We go here for trivia on Wednesdays and the staff is always nice! The pizza is great! They have good appetizers as well. I've also had the giant cookie, which is very deliecious. There is plenty of seating. Parking lot is small though because of all the businesses.

name: Scott M. Berry
text: Great service and great pizza. Don‚Äôt forget the to try the hummus.

name: Peter Matthew
text: Nice place. Good pizza. Good draft beer selection from PBR to local craft brews. Friendly staff. Dog friendly. Reasonably priced.

name: Mikki Valentine
text: Not very much sitting for a larger group but the food was great and the service was professional and friendly

name: Bandele Ezekiel
text: Great food and service

name: Matt Whitaker
text: Great pizza, and service!! Will definitely come back.

name: Randall Carroll
text: "Sorry not used to having that many people Not busy on Saturdays" is what the waitress said when we asked how many people working today..(three servers)...really on an game day. I get it the VOLS are not what they used to be but come on. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad Keith
text: Had a great calzone! The staff was friendly and attentive.

name: Robert Young
text: Ordered a carry out. Done on time even being very busy. Staff was friendly and the pizza was awesome!

name: Raymond Goepfrich
text: Sat at the bar and had fantastic service. Excellent beer selection and had good wine for my wife. Pizza was delicious. We enjoyed the thin crust and sauce...had a pepperoni and mushroom. We will definitely return!!

name: David Hargis
text: First off we went for trivia night.  A busy night I am sure.  I had to park across campbell station rd and walk to get to it because the parking lot design is not correct for so many businesses in one spot.  My kids liked the mac and cheese ‚Ä¶More

name: John Eshleman
text: This is one of my favorite pizzas of all time. I travel all over the US and love eating pizza. Very unique pizza and crust. This location can get very busy at peak times. For my family it is worth the wait. They do have an outdoor patio for when the weather is nice. Large bar with great service.

name: Amy Forson
text: Had the cheese steak, it was awesome & the service was impeccable

name: Robert Brockwell
text: Would have enjoyed more if I took a different date. Lol

name: S K
text: Yeah, it's pricey, but the quality is worth it.  This is our go-to pizza place and has been for years. Their seasonal pies are always interesting, but just get the house special and you'll never go wrong. It's nice that they have good ‚Ä¶More

name: Diane Frye
text: There pizza and sandwiches are delicious.

name: Chad Pratt
text: Great pizza and service.

name: jason longyear
text: Our prior Marine server was outstanding. I was in true aww!

name: Greg Moates
text: Our pizza was cold. Taste was alright but just not great. Not return worthy for us.

name: Kevin Hogg
text: I get a to-go box for the crust at this place. That‚Äôs how good it is. Also, Jake is a great waiter. He gave us just the right amount of attention, and has good taste in beer.

name: Koda Cross
text: Very nice waiter. Food was amazing as always. The MAUI WOWIE is by far the best pizza they have. Highly recommend it here.

name: Jeffrey-Michael Kane
text: Vegan cheese and vegan salad dressings available here.

name: Libby Ritchey
text: Had great time tonight, food great & our server Stephanie was awesome!

name: Karen Price
text: Loved it great food and service

name: Garrett Boyd
text: Awesome pizza , great service, pitchers of beer and large tables make this a great group spot for any size. TV's have sports , news, and events from several angles, they have a full bar and pizza is the specialty but their appetizers should not be over looked as they have good options and kids menu.

name: Dylan B
text: Very good

name: logan loy
text: Love the jerk chicken sandwich

name: Suzette Adams

name: D Petty
text: We stopped in very late and were treated wonderfully by Jacob. After a long day of traveling, it was such a great experience!

name: Ordalis Mountain
text: Great pizza, amazing service üëå

name: Erik
text:
Great atmosphere, friendly staff. Waitress was always around when you needed her. Dont recall her name, but she was amazing.
Oh yeah, food was yummy too!

name: Bri Payne
text: Food so good!! Lots of variety!

name: Andrew
text: Good food, good prices, great big portions what's not to like? Nice variety of ingredients allows you to customize the dishes to your tastes or dietary restrictions easily while exploring new options.

name: Jacqueline Bichsel
text: Great pizza! I've been here many times. Last time, they messed up our order in multiple ways, but management more than made up for it by taking responsibility and giving us some free food and drinks. They care about service and good food.

name: Robert Trentham
text: Great and amazing buffalo chicken pizza. Clean and great atmosphere.

name: Chris Klein
text: Fast service! The meaty Pizza was very good. Jake our waiter provided great service! Would eat there again!

name: Stacey Senn
text: The server was great, food was decent

name: Jose Aguilar
text: Great food. Nice place and friendly staff.  Vegan friendly menu.

name: Justin Litwin
text: Over prized glorified pizza and over priced wine I'll skip it get Stephanos pizza and buy my own wine .food was good but came with a sticker marked for a foreign sports car and not nearly as good as stephanos pizza on ut campus in my personal opinion

name: charles boyd
text: Trump is nobody's president at mellow mushroom

name: The Music
text: Great 10"  pizza for one person

name: Kim Hixson
text: The food was wonderful!

name: Ann Vest
text: My daughter took me to Mellow Mushroom for Mother's Day and it was great... service was very good and the food was delicious.... I love to go to Mellow Mushroom....

name: amber lemaire

name: Susan Summers

text: Fantastic pizza! Deliciousness overshadows normally slow pizza service. Go there when you have some time!

name: Robert Thomas
text: Great food and beer!
